name: Rifat Hosasin
short_des: I build robust, scalable mobile applications.
long_des: I’m a Flutter app developer with over 3 years of experience, specializing in crafting high-performance, cross-platform mobile applications. I’ve worked on a wide range of projects including POS systems, VPN apps, and e-commerce platforms. Currently, I’m focused on building smooth, scalable, and user-friendly mobile experiences that make a real impact.
